lead_paragraph: Retirees who make their own investment decisions save money on fees, but face complex questions on taxes and estate planning. Online tools, and investment clubs, can help those going it alone.

headline.print_headline: The Risks and Rewards of Self-Managing Investment Portfolios
headline.main: The Risks and Rewards of Self-Managing Investment Portfolios

snippet: Retirees who make their own investment decisions save money on fees, but face complex questions on taxes and estate planning. Online tools, and investment clubs, can help those going it alone.
abstract: Retiring column; benefits are there for retirees who manage their own financial portfolios, such as avoiding fees, but dangers abound, especially regarding complex investment issues; experts say one solution is to combine do-it-yourself management with help from advisers to set up a self-managed portfolio.
